ygData.subject: Welcome
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi there, and welcome to the group. I only joined myself recently, and I discovered there is a huge list of topics previously covered. I spent a whole (slow)
ygData.messageBody:
Hi there, and welcome to the group. I only joined myself recently,
and I discovered there is a huge list of topics previously covered. I
spent a whole (slow) afternoon at work reading my way through them.

You don't see much happening sometimes, but-oh,my-post a question,
and there'll be plenty of advice for you, so a lot of women read it.

I hope you have your new spells now, and good luck with your chanter.
You'll never be short of a group with her, and grouping is where the
most fun is to be had, imho.

Love, Liz

aka Gyngermynx, Ranger of Tunare, 40 seasons, Quellious
